genre.description: The value of endpoint field returned in .../title/list-popular-genres endpoint

function.name: genre_for_list_movies
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "list_movies", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Used to filter by a given genre (See http://www.imdb.com/genre/ for full list)"

function.name: list_movies_for_list_movies_v3
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "list_movies_v3", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Used to list and search through out all the available movies. Can sort, filter, search and order the results"

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

answer_generation.query: I want to explore different types of movies. May I list five different genres of movies, and for each genre, suggest the most classic movie in that genre.
